title: The Apprentice 2015: Twitter cringed as the candidates got in a lather over shampoo
text:
The Apprentice 2015: Twitter cringed as the candidates got in a lather over shampoo The Apprentice 2015: Twitter cringed as the candidates got in a lather over shampoo 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
Lord Sugar tasked his Apprentice candidates with the job of coming up with a shampoo marketing concept and, predictably, they got in a lather. 
The second challenge involved branding a new shampoo containing cactus seed oil, creating a digital billboard and producing a 30-second TV advert. Candidates from The Apprentice (BBC) 
Split down gender lines, the girls named their product Desert Secrets and marketed it to the over 40s. Meanwhile, the boys hailed Western, their shampoo aimed at men. 
For users on Twitter, it was a wince-fest. The cringe factor 
â€” Volpes volpes (@oheydawg) October 15, 2015 #theapprentice CRINGE!! I'm watching from behind a cushion
